 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָוַח‎</span>] **verb** ==cry aloud== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; so Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒâ—u***</u></abbr> (?), Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צְוַח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***call***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְוָ֑חוּ‎</span> [[Isa.42.11|Isa 42:11]] (in joy, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֹ֫נוּ‎</span>).
